citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am on
03/09/2016. Contact was made with the licensee by phone and it was relayed that no one would be available to
accompany the inspector during the inspection process for the day.
